# vertexArguments

**Instance Property**

An array of argument instances, each of which represent a parameter of the pipeline state’s vertex shader.

## Declaration

```swift
var vertexArguments: [MTLArgument]? { get }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLArgument] elements in the array are in the same order as the vertex shader’s declaration signature.
